markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Contagion Metabolizer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1960)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Contagion metabolizers seek out toxins in the bloodstream and attempt to purify them into humors the body processes naturally. When you drink this elixir, it attempts a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check with the listed counteract modifier to remove the highest-level [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) or [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) afflicting you. This takes longer for a disease—the counteract check doesn't happen until 10 minutes after you drink the elixir. After drinking, you become temporarily immune to contagion metabolizers for 1 hour.

 If you're a [chirurgeon alchemist](/ResearchFields.aspx?ID=2) and have [powerful alchemy](/Classes.aspx?ID=1), you can substitute your statistics when you create a contagion metabolizer using [Quick Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=667), if your stats are higher. This replaces the counteract level with half your level rounded up and the counteract modifier with your class DC – 10.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Contagion Metabolizer (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The elixir has a counteract level of 3 and a +11 counteract modifier.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Contagion Metabolizer (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The elixir has a counteract level of 6 and a +19 counteract modifier.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 19"
pfs="Standard"
>
Contagion Metabolizer (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 8,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The elixir has a counteract level of 10 and a +30 counteract modifier.
name: Contagion Metabolizer
